concept.title: The Object Browser
concept.shortdesc: View or delete objects stored in using the Object Browser.

conbody.p: The Object Browser lets you view individual objects that have been stored in PHEMI Central. You can see the metadata that has been applied to the object, the data elements (if any) that have been derived by running a DPF on the data, and the binary data that makes up the object, shown as hexadecimal with an ASCII interpretation.

The Object Browser is the only access to data that a has in , and only a can access the Object Browser. As with all other kinds of queries to the system, access to data is constrained by the governance placed around the data.
